mapper.sql: select id, user_id, identity_type, identifier, credential, verified from account
mapper.insert: insert into account(user_id, identity_type, identifier, credential, verified, create_time, update_time, deleted) values (#{userId}, #{identityType}, #{identifier}, #{credential}, 0, now(), now(), 0)
mapper.select: update account set deleted = 1, update_time = now() where id = #{id}
update account set deleted = 1, update_time = now() where user_id = #{userId}
where identifier = #{identifier} and credential = #{credential} and identity_type = #{identityType} and deleted = 0 order by id asc limit 1
update account set verified = 1, update_time = now() where id = #{id} and verified = 0
